modName: Stealth Perks for Sneak Based Followers - No DLC or Dawnguard Only
summary: A small update to the original mod by Scope2008 to remove Dragonborn DLC as a requirement, and another option to remove all DLC requirements.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small update to Scope2008's original mod here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40632/

If you have Dragonborn and want followers from the Dragonborn DLC to be modded, you need to download Scope2008's version.

I've only made Scope2008's mod compatible with Dawnguard only or No DLC; other than that, bugs are attributable to the original mod.

=============================================================================================

I wanted to use Scope2008's mod but I do not own Dragonborn, I only have Dawnguard, so I used TES5edit to remove Dragonborn references and cleaned the masterfile header so Dragonborn.esm was not a requirement.

Following this thought I also created a version without Dawnguard references or requirements (so no DLC required).

Sorry that I cannot create a Dragonborn only (no Dawnguard) version, but since I don't own Dragonborn my esp would be missing necessary references and file values.

Both the Sneaky followers and all followers versions are here, and Karliah is still included in the mods.

=============================================================================================
Thanks/Credits

All credit goes to Scope2008 for creating this mod. Images are taken directly from his mod.

My edits only took 5 minutes once I figured out how to clean the esp using TES5edit (available here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/) Thanks to Sharlikran and the TES5edit team.
author: Duinuogwuin
